title: Bloomberg Markets: Rabbat on Why Gif is Future of Marketing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Rabbat on Why Gif is Future of Marketing
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Richard Rabbat Chief Executive Officer Gfycat Discussing the GIFs, short form video content, on how marketers need to break their content down to keep consumers’ attention.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
